item.title: Debugging LWP with mitmproxy
item.description: Are you using an LWP app, and trying to debug it? My personal preferences is using mitmproxy. To get LWP to use mitmproxy, set the following ENV variables: PERL_LWP_ENV_PROXY=1 HTTPS_PROXY='http://localhost:8080/' ./script/myapp Note, this also works for apps using Mojo::UserAgent, except you don't need the first ENV variable.
